content:
You are visiting San Francisco for the day and want to meet as many friends as possible. Solve the problem by considering various different schedules and picking the best one to optimize your goals.

Travel distances (in minutes):
Sunset District to Russian Hill: 24.
Sunset District to The Castro: 17.
Sunset District to Richmond District: 12.
Sunset District to Marina District: 21.
Sunset District to North Beach: 29.
Sunset District to Union Square: 30.
Sunset District to Golden Gate Park: 11.
Russian Hill to Sunset District: 23.
Russian Hill to The Castro: 21.
Russian Hill to Richmond District: 14.
Russian Hill to Marina District: 7.
Russian Hill to North Beach: 5.
Russian Hill to Union Square: 11.
Russian Hill to Golden Gate Park: 21.
The Castro to Sunset District: 17.
The Castro to Russian Hill: 18.
The Castro to Richmond District: 16.
The Castro to Marina District: 21.
The Castro to North Beach: 20.
The Castro to Union Square: 19.
The Castro to Golden Gate Park: 11.
Richmond District to Sunset District: 11.
Richmond District to Russian Hill: 13.
Richmond District to The Castro: 16.
Richmond District to Marina District: 9.
Richmond District to North Beach: 17.
Richmond District to Union Square: 21.
Richmond District to Golden Gate Park: 9.
Marina District to Sunset District: 19.
Marina District to Russian Hill: 8.
Marina District to The Castro: 22.
Marina District to Richmond District: 11.
Marina District to North Beach: 11.
Marina District to Union Square: 16.
Marina District to Golden Gate Park: 18.
North Beach to Sunset District: 27.
North Beach to Russian Hill: 4.
North Beach to The Castro: 22.
North Beach to Richmond District: 18.
North Beach to Marina District: 9.
North Beach to Union Square: 7.
North Beach to Golden Gate Park: 22.
Union Square to Sunset District: 26.
Union Square to Russian Hill: 13.
Union Square to The Castro: 19.
Union Square to Richmond District: 20.
Union Square to Marina District: 18.
Union Square to North Beach: 10.
Union Square to Golden Gate Park: 22.
Golden Gate Park to Sunset District: 10.
Golden Gate Park to Russian Hill: 19.
Golden Gate Park to The Castro: 13.
Golden Gate Park to Richmond District: 7.
Golden Gate Park to Marina District: 16.
Golden Gate Park to North Beach: 24.
Golden Gate Park to Union Square: 22.

CONSTRAINTS: You arrive at Sunset District at 9:00AM. Karen will be at Russian Hill from 8:45PM to 9:45PM. You'd like to meet Karen for a minimum of 60 minutes. Jessica will be at The Castro from 3:45PM to 7:30PM. You'd like to meet Jessica for a minimum of 60 minutes. Matthew will be at Richmond District from 7:30AM to 3:15PM. You'd like to meet Matthew for a minimum of 15 minutes. Michelle will be at Marina District from 10:30AM to 6:45PM. You'd like to meet Michelle for a minimum of 75 minutes. Carol will be at North Beach from 12:00PM to 5:00PM. You'd like to meet Carol for a minimum of 90 minutes. Stephanie will be at Union Square from 10:45AM to 2:15PM. You'd like to meet Stephanie for a minimum of 30 minutes. Linda will be at Golden Gate Park from 10:45AM to 10:00PM. You'd like to meet Linda for a minimum of 90 minutes.

Your response should start with 'SOLUTION:'.

Please output the meeting schedule in the following JSON format:
{"meetings": [{"day": "<DAY>", "start_time": "<HH:MM>", "end_time": "<HH:MM>"}]}

SOLUTION:  
To maximize the number of friends met while adhering to the minimum meeting times and travel constraints, the optimal schedule involves meeting all seven friends. The schedule starts at Sunset District at 9:00 AM and sequences the meetings to minimize waiting time and ensure all meetings fit within the availability windows, with travel times accounted for. Matthew is met first in Richmond District due to proximity and early availability, with the meeting extended to reduce idle time later. Carol's meeting is also extended to avoid waiting before meeting Jessica. Linda is met after Jessica to reduce the waiting time before meeting Karen in the evening. The final schedule includes all friends with meetings occurring within their specified time frames and meeting or exceeding the minimum duration requirements.

Output in the required JSON format:

{"meetings": [{"day": "Today", "start_time": "09:12", "end_time": "10:24"}, {"day": "Today", "start_time": "10:45", "end_time": "11:15"}, {"day": "Today", "start_time": "11:33", "end_time": "12:48"}, {"day": "Today", "start_time": "12:59", "end_time": "15:23"}, {"day": "Today", "start_time": "15:45", "end_time": "16:45"}, {"day": "Today", "start_time": "16:56", "end_time": "18:26"}, {"day": "Today", "start_time": "20:45", "end_time": "21:45"}]}
